import React, { useReducer } from "react"; import DigitButton from "./digitButton"; const ACTIONS ={ ADD:"ADD", OPERATION:"OPERATION", CLEAR:"CLEAR", DEL:"DEL", EVAL:"EVAL" } const initialState = { current:"0", previous:"", operation:"" } const reducer = (state,{type,payload}) =>{ } export default function App(){ let [{current,previous,operation},dispatch] = useReducer(reducer,initialState) return(
Calculator
{previous}
{current}
